Package cm2100.diary

Interface RepeatAppointment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TimedRepeatAppointment, UntimedRepeatAppointment
    public interface RepeatAppointment
    This interface defines the methods expected on a repeating appointment. This is also a handy method included to find all the dates that a repeating appointment occurs.
    Author:
    K. Hui

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Collection<Date> getDates()
      Return all the dates that the repeat appointment occurs.
      static Collection<Date> getDates​(RepeatAppointment a)
      This handy method is used to find all dates that a repeat appointment occurs.
      Date getEndDate()
      Get the ending date of the repeat appointment.
      RepeatType getRepeatType()
      Get the repeating type of the repeat appointment.
      Date getStartDate()
      Get the starting date of the repeat appointment.

    • Method Detail

      • getRepeatType

        RepeatType getRepeatType()
        Get the repeating type of the repeat appointment. It should be either daily, monthly or yearly. See the enumerated type RepeatType.
        Returns:
        The repeating type.

      • getStartDate

        Date getStartDate()
        Get the starting date of the repeat appointment. This is the same as the generic date field of a appointment.
        Returns:
        The starting date of repetition.

      • getEndDate

        Date getEndDate()
        Get the ending date of the repeat appointment.
        Returns:
        The ending date.

      • getDates

        Collection<Date> getDates()
        Return all the dates that the repeat appointment occurs.
        Returns:
        A Collection of Date objects.

      • getDates

        static Collection<Date> getDates​(RepeatAppointment a)
        This handy method is used to find all dates that a repeat appointment occurs. I put it here as it is used by all implementing concrete classes. Return all occurring dates of a repeat appointment.
        Parameters:
        a - The repeating appointment.
        Returns:
        A Collection of Date on which the appointment occurs.
